mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT p.id, p. CODE, p. NAME, p.uri, p.method FROM bms_permission p INNER JOIN bms_role_permission rp ON p.id = rp.permission_id INNER JOIN bms_role r ON r.id = rp.role_id INNER JOIN bms_user_role ur ON ur.role_id = r.id INNER JOIN bms_user u ON u.id = ur.user_id WHERE u.user_name = #{userName} AND p.is_deleted = 'N' AND rp.is_deleted = 'N' AND r.is_deleted = 'N' AND ur.is_deleted = 'N' AND u.is_deleted = 'N' UNION SELECT DISTINCT p.id, p. CODE, p. NAME, p.uri, p.method FROM bms_permission p WHERE p.id IN ( SELECT b.permission_id FROM bms_user_permission b INNER JOIN bms_user u ON b.user_id = u.id WHERE u.user_name = #{userName} AND b.is_deleted = 'N' AND U.is_deleted = 'N' AND b.type = '+' )
SELECT distinct b.permission_id FROM bms_user_permission b INNER JOIN bms_user u ON b.user_id = u.id WHERE u.user_name = #{userName} AND b.is_deleted = 'N' AND U.is_deleted = 'N' AND b.type = '-'
